column1: * This file has been designed to work with:

column2: the Group quickkey will be converted to 0-9 by 'mod 10' conversion.

column1: *  Also 'service' strings will be limited to 15 characters.
*  20 - Local Railroad Frequencies (in a different system definition)
*  21 - All Railroad Frequencies  (in a different system definition)
*** S-TYPE field is the number for the 'FuncTagId' as defined by the SDSx00 file specification
*** These numbers are values between 1-37 and 208-218. If this value is not set in
*** The logic used for setting this value:
***  If value in 'FREQ' record > 0 then use that value
***  Else if value in 'GROUP' record referenced >0 Then use that value
*** Numbers defined in the spec are as follows:
* NOTE:If this file is automatically processed
column2: some fields as well as comments may be lost
do NOT include semi-colons in any comment or data record. Will drive .csv parser crazy!

column1: * records starting with '*' or '#' are ignored
* At least one 'System' record is required for each file
* Records that start with '*:rectype:' identify the field position for record type 'rectype'
*  Index: Unique number for the record

column4: record will not be scanned or selected in the radio

column1: *  Service: Any string with any characters except '
*  Dlyrsm:A number between -10 and +30. Negative number is Resume. 0 is Off
*  Sysno:System record index. Required for Site & Group records
*  Siteno:Site record Index. Required for TFreq records
*  Groupno:Group record Index. Required for Freq records
*  Hld:(System/Site records). Time in seconds to hold on the system or site
*  Frequency:(Freq & TFreq records). Can be in Hz or Mhz
*  P25wait:Time in ms to wait for a P25 decode to complete
*  Channel - RadioCtl channel number. If 'b' flag set in system
*  Extra: This field is used for values that are usually limited to one or two radios and is numeric.
*         Extra field data is in the format SSSn
column2: where 'SSS' is some string and 'n' is a number.
any keyword for the record not specified will be set to the default

column1: # Records can be key=value type as well
** This tag defines the field positions for each record. This is the default if  not specified
*key        num   service                      valid group     flags chanl  frequency mode   tgid     tone   tone_type dlyrsm extra   split freq split_mode Split_tone Split_Tone_type
